Reviews.Title: “We always enjoy our stay!”
Reviews.Author: Makerofdreams
Reviews.Content: Checking in is always easy. They have been remodeling the rooms but we are always on the bottom floor with King size bed and it is very nice. Our rooms have always been clean. The breakfast is good ...Our grandson said he 'loves!!' their breakfast. lol We stop here when we go through........

Reviews.Title: “Place was Probably Nice in 1994”
Reviews.Author: ZorroKSE
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a convenient location for travelers with many options and a variety of dining choices close by. This place is in need of a complete cleaning. There is a large vent in the ceiling of the center area of the suite. It was disgusting knowing the air was blowing through this filthy vent. In the bathroom, I can understand a stray hair or two. However, there were many long black hairs on the underside of the toilet seat. Gross! The pain in the bathroom was peeling pretty badly. We noticed the vacum cleaner used by the maid when it was parked in the hallway. It was certainly not a commercial quality vacum--it was the $30 Wal-Mart type. No wonder there was stuff that was not picked up on the rugs and elsewhere. We arrived late and went to grab a late-night dinner. Upon returning the door was locked. There is not a device to swipe your room key in. We had to buzz in. However, there was nobody around to answer the buzzer. We waited quite awhile outside. The owner apparently spent money on this place about 15 years ago and hasn't put anything into it since.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth the 40$ for the room.”
Reviews.Author: chrisfromcleve
Reviews.Content: This place is older and I would say that it could use a good vacuuming.. but that said, for the 40$ a night I spent I had a living area with desk, free wi fi, refrigerator, microwave, and king bed. There was also continental breakfast in the am. My friend stayed across the street for 100$ night. Her property was also an older place and she had no free wi fi.. no heat the first night, problems with the TV, no breakfast....and she got to listen to the kids running up and down the hall from the waterslide park. Nice staff and a basic room.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: HelloCrazy
Reviews.Content: From the outside this hotels look fine for the price and the lobby looks ok, but it's downhill from there. The cleaning staff left there used cleaning supplies in the room, my non-smoking room smelled so much like smoke, so I tried to open the windows and found that there was a large whole in the screen and windows were cloudy like they haven't been cleaned in years. And the facet in the "kitchen" area was left running. Then at 4:00 in the morning the garbage truck came and it felt like the whole room was shaking. At 5:45 am the person next to me started the shower and the sound of the pipes made me think there was a fire alarm going off. This is one of the worst hotels I've ever stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “Awful experience”
Reviews.Author: CardzFan937
Reviews.Content: This is one of the worst hotels I've ever stayed in. My fellow business companion booked a non-smoking room but they did not have it when we arrived. Despite giving the front desk their cell number for the manager who was not onsite to call, he never did. They advertise free wireless Internet. However it was worthless as it kept going in and out. I called the support number based on the wi-fi card they had in the room only to find they don't service the hotel! Why then is the card & number in their rooms? The hotel staff could'nt say! Rooms are dimly lit and the two TV's had poor reception - good luck watching a baseball game if you want to see the ball! I had hoped to try the continental breakfast buffet at least, but it was sparse and with only 4 tables I had no place to sit even if I wanted to. If I was on my own dime I would have eaten the cancelation fee of a nights stay and left and checked in at a beautiful Hilton Homestead Suite a quarter mile away. Run don't walk away from this dump! ......FYI this is the first hotel I've ever rated in 25+ years of business travel, but it was just awful.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience- never again”
Reviews.Author: eztobe
Reviews.Content: What a horrible experience, the worst staff I have ever experienced. Not a clean place, never again at a Best Western if this is the best they can do. Ever hear of BEDBUGS.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: colette424
Reviews.Content: We stopped here on a drive to Ohio and were pleasantly surprised. It was not a fancy, 5 star hotel, but it was clean and comfortable. The rooms were all suites and were a nice size, with a sitting room separate from the bedroom. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful. There was a free continental breakfast with a pretty good selection of food.

Reviews.Title: “No pool”
Reviews.Author: wtrmom
Reviews.Content: Just ok place, cute decore, but REALLY need to get a new vacuum! The place does have a 'tired' look about it inside and out. Like it all needs a good scrubbing. There is NO POOL, if travelling with kids in summer, this matters. There is a Holiday Inn just down the street with a HUGE indoor water park, wish I'd known.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Property”
Reviews.Author: worldtraveler1868
Reviews.Content: This property is very clean and the staff is very friendly. The little Chinese Rest. in the parking lot is VERY GOOD. I would reccommend this hotel to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel!”
Reviews.Author: caspyboy
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as a stopover for one night and found it to be better than expected. Upon entering this hotel we were greeted with a beautifully decorated lobby area. We were given a room on the 2nd floor (a suite). Our room was spacious and very relaxing after a day of travelling. A living room area with a sofa, armchair, coffee table, TV and desk. There was a sink area with microwave and frige. The "bedroom" was the best part - spacious, extra TV, big closet, beautiful new bed covers and pillows, a big window that opened. The bed was a king size and very comfortable. The room and bathroom were very clean and everything was in working order. Breakfast was 6am-9am in a lovely breakfast room that was clean, relaxing and tastefully decorated. It included coffee, juice, cereal, yogurt, waffles, omlettes, toast, fruit, pastries. Coffee was available with free cookies in the lobby. Our only regret was that we were just passing through and came and left so quickly. It's a great place, clean and comfortable and with a bit of charm often lacking in chain hotels. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “nice breaskfast”
Reviews.Author: jumps2876
Reviews.Content: Very Cool new breakfast....ham and chess omelets really nice and waffles.... hot chocolate

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: lafguy60
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a place to stay on the nortwest side of Indianapolis and saw the reviews for this hotel and made our reservation. The website said the hotel was newly renovated and they were not kidding. There was the odor of fresh paint everywhere. Not objectionable, just noticeable. The room is a 2 room suite with a sitting area with sofa-bed, chair, televison and desk/work area. The bedroom contained a king size bed, televsion, dresser and 2 night stands. The stay was very pleasant and there we had only a few minor complaints. The first was that the desk clerk at check-in was efficient, but never did smile. The other item of note was about the continental breakfast offered. Actually, there was a waffle station, there were omelets, pastries, juice, bagels, fruit, yogurt and cereal. The only cereals available were sugared. That was the only complaint about the breafast offerings. If you are looking for a clean, comfortable, quiet place to stay the Best Western Country Suites is the ticket in northwest Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD PLACE NEW ROOM ARE GREAT”
Reviews.Author: lalu8500
Reviews.Content: it was great place to spend night.... new remodel room are excellent........excellent value for great low price

Reviews.Title: “This was a great place”
Reviews.Author: evaluator
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Best Western for 2 nights, & the Suites idea is fabulous. We had grandchildren with us & they could have their "own room" complete with TV. The sofa bed was fine with them. The suite was very nice, had a microwave & refrig which came in handy for heating the night before's leftovers for lunch before we left. It was neat & clean, comfortable, had a nice breakfast, great exercise room, even a computer in the lobby. It is very convenient to so many things & right off 465 & near 65. The people at the desk were very helpful. We were pretty impressed with this place & are planning to stay there again in a month or 2 when we go to Indy with relatives.

Reviews.Title: “It was a great visit!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed at your hotel the last month of june,2006. it was a great experience for me and my family!It was my sons first time in a hotel and he loved it as did my wife and i.It was close to major dept. stores, as well as fine dining.Thank you for the fine stayand breakfast,it was filling. your rooms were spacious and comfortable. my son is 5 and he had plenty of room to roam.Thank you very much, the Arnett family!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Massage_on_the_go
Reviews.Content: I travel every couple of weeks, I always stay there. They treat me very well. I like that it is a suite instead of just a bedroom. It has everything you would need as a business person, with a great price.

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Country Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 3871 West 92nd Street, Indianapolis, IN 46268
